messages.content:
Subject: Invitation to join HealthPulse for an episode on emerging virology threats

Dear Dr. Ross,

I hope you’re well. My name is Maya, and I host the HealthPulse podcast, where we explore the latest developments in public health and infectious disease research. Our listeners are avidly following topics such as COVID‑19, vaccine innovation, and emerging viruses – areas where your groundbreaking work on coronavirus evolution has been hugely influential.

We are planning an upcoming episode titled “The Future of Virology: Battling Emerging Threats,” and I would be thrilled if you could join us to discuss your insights on how virology is shaping pandemic preparedness, the challenges of zoonotic spillover, and what the next generation of vaccines might look like.

The episode would be a 45‑minute conversation recorded remotely at a time convenient for you. We would love to share your expertise with our engaged audience, who are eager to learn from leading researchers like yourself.

Please let me know if you’re interested and what dates might work for you. I’m happy to provide any additional details you may need.

Thank you for considering this invitation. I look forward to the possibility of speaking with you.

Warm regards,
Maya
Host – HealthPulse Podcast
maya@healthpulsepod.com
Here’s the email draft ready to send to Dr. Emily Ross. Let me know if you’d like any tweaks or if you’d like me to send it on your behalf.
